00054 struct tgt_thread_info {
00055         /* server and client data buffers */
00056         struct lr_server_data    tti_lsd;
00057         struct lsd_client_data   tti_lcd;
00058         struct lsd_reply_data    tti_lrd;
00059         struct lu_buf            tti_buf;
00060         loff_t                   tti_off;
00061 
00062         struct lu_attr           tti_attr;
00063         struct lu_fid            tti_fid1;
00064 
00065         /* transno storage during last_rcvd update */
00066         __u64                    tti_transno;
00067         __u32                    tti_has_trans:1,
00068                                  tti_mult_trans:1;
00069 
00070         /* Updates data for OUT target */
00071         struct thandle_exec_args tti_tea;
00072         union {
00073                 struct {
00074                         /* for tgt_readpage()      */
00075                         struct lu_rdpg     tti_rdpg;
00076                         /* for tgt_sendpage()      */
00077                         struct l_wait_info tti_wait_info;
00078                 } rdpg;
00079                 struct {
00080                         struct dt_object_format    tti_update_dof;
00081                         struct object_update_reply *tti_update_reply;
00082                         struct object_update       *tti_update;
00083                         int                        tti_update_reply_index;
00084                         struct obdo                tti_obdo;
00085                         struct dt_object           *tti_dt_object;
00086                         struct l_wait_info tti_wait_info;
00087                 } update;
00088         } tti_u;
00089         struct lfsck_request tti_lr;
00090         struct dt_insert_rec tti_rec;
00091 };
00092 
00093 extern struct lu_context_key tgt_thread_key;
00094 
00095 static inline struct tgt_thread_info *tgt_th_info(const struct lu_env *env)
00096 {
00097         struct tgt_thread_info *tti;
00098 
00099         tti = lu_context_key_get(&env->le_ctx, &tgt_thread_key);
00100         LASSERT(tti);
00101         return tti;
00102 }

00104 #define MGS_SERVICE_WATCHDOG_FACTOR      (2)

00106 int tgt_request_handle(struct ptlrpc_request *req);
00107 
00108 /* check if request's xid is equal to last one or not*/
00109 static inline int req_xid_is_last(struct ptlrpc_request *req)
00110 {
00111         struct lsd_client_data *lcd = req->rq_export->exp_target_data.ted_lcd;
00112 
00113         LASSERT(lcd != NULL);
00114         return (req->rq_xid == lcd->lcd_last_xid ||
00115                 req->rq_xid == lcd->lcd_last_close_xid);
00116 }
00117 
00118 static inline char *dt_obd_name(struct dt_device *dt)
00119 {
00120         return dt->dd_lu_dev.ld_obd->obd_name;
00121 }

00257 struct update_thread_info {
00258         struct lu_attr                  uti_attr;
00259         struct lu_fid                   uti_fid;
00260         struct lu_buf                   uti_buf;
00261         struct thandle_update_records   uti_tur;
00262         struct obdo                     uti_obdo;
00263         struct thandle_exec_args        uti_tea;
00264         struct dt_insert_rec            uti_rec;
00265         struct distribute_txn_replay_req *uti_dtrq;
00266 };

00268 extern struct lu_context_key update_thread_key;
00269 
00270 static inline struct update_thread_info *
00271 update_env_info(const struct lu_env *env)
00272 {
00273         struct update_thread_info *uti;
00274 
00275         uti = lu_context_key_get(&env->le_ctx, &update_thread_key);
00276         LASSERT(uti != NULL);
00277         return uti;
00278 }
